snippet: Andy Murray and Rafael Nadal will meet again in the semifinals of the Madrid Open on Saturday, a rematch of last year's final won by the British player....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray and Rafael Nadal will meet again in the semifinals of the Madrid Open on Saturday, a rematch of last year's final won by the British player.

headline.print_headline: Murray and Nadal to Meet in Madrid Open Semifinals
headline.main: Murray and Nadal to Meet in Madrid Open Semifinals
